code: import{GET_USERS,USER_UPDATED,ERR}from'../constants/action-types';var initialState={type:GET_USERS,users:[]};function rootReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type===GET_USERS){return Object.assign({},state,{users:state.users.concat(action.payload)});}else if(action.type===USER_UPDATED){return Object.assign({},state,{users:state.users.concat(action.payload)});}else if(action.type===ERR){return state;}else{return state;}};export default rootReducer;
